item.title: Argentina to Get $500 Million Chevron Investment, Massa Says
item.description: Argentina to Receive $500 Million Investment from Chevron Argentina is set to receive a $500 million investment from Chevron Corporation. The investment will be used to develop the Vaca Muerta shale oil field, which is the world’s second-largest shale oil field after the Bakken Formation in the United States.
